title: Traccar LXC
textContent:
Traccar LXC 
                Traccar is an open
                    source GPS tracking system. It supports more than 200 GPS protocols and more than 2000 models of GPS
                    tracking devices.
                To create a new Proxmox VE Traccar LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/traccar.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 2GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡
                Traccar Interface: IP:8082
outerHTML:
Traccar LXC

Traccar is an open source GPS tracking system. It supports more than 200 GPS protocols and more than 2000 models of GPS tracking devices.

To create a new Proxmox VE Traccar LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/traccar.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 2GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡

Traccar Interface: IP:8082
